frontmatter.title: My Solo Ranking of Button Shy Games
frontmatter.description: My solo ranking of their games as of May 9th 2023

frontmatter.title: When to Buy New Games?
frontmatter.description: As someone new to the hobby I've found it difficult to decide when to buy new games.

frontmatter.title: Sprawlopolis
frontmatter.description: Sprawlopolis is a fantastic city builder in solo with high replayability.

frontmatter.title: Death Valley (Solo Mode)
frontmatter.description: Death Valley provides great tableau building in a small package but has limited replayability.

frontmatter.title: Ragemore
frontmatter.description: Ragemore initially feels good but ultimately lacks depth and variety.

frontmatter.title: SpaceShipped
frontmatter.description: SpaceShipped is a great space merchant adventure that is let down by extreme randomness.
